name: Shuriken Evasion
description:
This is an endless dodging game where players need to evade guided shuriken coming towards them.

Story: You were on an espionage mission. You successfully stole the secret code and gathered important intel, and while returning, you disguised yourself as a paper plane. But YOU WERE BEING WATCHED, and your disguise has been compromised.  EVADE THE ENEMY'S SHURIKENS AT ALL COSTS!

Controls and other information: Use the mouse cursor to navigate through the snowy skies. Click to Activate boost. Shuriken of same type destroy each other upon collision and give you points. Press Esc during gameplay to Pause the game and press again to Resume. Good Luck!

BEWARE: Black shuriken are fast, but Red ones are even faster!

Tip: The Game might seem a little difficult at first but once you understand how to use the inertia of shuriken against them, you'll be a pro in no time :)

Can you beat my current HighScore (435) ?

Credits to respective owners for the following:

The explosion sprites  were downloaded from http://gushh.net/blog/free-game-sprites-explosion-3/

The image of the paper plane was downloaded from https://icons-for-free.com/paper+plane+plane+send+icon-1320186883780016792/

The main Shepard tone music was downloaded from https://orangefreesounds.com/shepard-tone/
